metadata.greeting: Hey George! Get ready for a super fun weekend! We've got amazing adventures planned, from riding the DLR like a real train driver to seeing tons of farm animals at Mudchute, and even a dinosaur adventure! Let's get exploring!

activities.title: DLR Adventure to Mudchute Farm
activities.description: Take a thrilling ride on the DLR (sit at the front!) to Mudchute Farm, one of the biggest city farms in Europe. See llamas, cows, sheep, and more, and enjoy a full day of farm fun.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: It's trains AND farm animals! Plus, Mudchute is massive, perfect for running around and getting muddy.

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Stratford, then Jubilee line to Canary Wharf, then DLR to Mudchute, 45 mins
transport.tip: Sit at the front of the DLR for the best views!

activities.title: Hackney City Farm Visit & Pottery Fun
activities.description: Meet pigs, goats, donkeys, and chickens at Hackney City Farm! Afterwards, try your hand at pottery (small fee applies) and get creative.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: He loves animals and getting messy, and Hackney City Farm is super close to home!

transport.tip: Check out the cafe for a tasty snack!

activities.title: Olympic Park Playground Adventure
activities.description: Explore the MASSIVE playgrounds at the Olympic Park, including Tumbling Bay (sand and water!) and the Pleasure Gardens (splash area in summer). Plenty of space to run and play.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Huge playgrounds, sand, water - what's not to love? He'll burn off tons of energy!

transport.tip: Pack a change of clothes for Tumbling Bay!

activities.title: Young V&A Playtime
activities.description: Explore the under 5s play area at the Young V&A, with plenty of hands-on activities and design workshops to spark creativity.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: A dedicated play area where he can touch and explore to his heart's content.

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Shoreditch High Street, then Central Line to Bethnal Green, 25 mins
transport.tip: Check the schedule for design workshops.

activities.title: Victoria Park Playground and Deer Spotting
activities.description: Enjoy two great playgrounds, spot deer in the enclosure, and maybe even take a boat ride on the lake at Victoria Park. A classic Hackney day out!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Playgrounds AND animals! Plus, it's a short trip from home.

transport.tube: Mile End (Central, District, Hammersmith & City lines)
transport.tip: Bring bread to feed the ducks (but not too much!).

activities.title: Discover Children's Story Centre Adventure
activities.description: Immerse yourself in interactive storytelling, dressing up, and character visits at the Discover Children's Story Centre. A world of imagination awaits!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: With interactive exhibits and dressing up he'll have a blast acting out his favorite stories.

transport.tip: Check the schedule for character appearances.

activities.title: Dinosaur Discovery at the Natural History Museum
activities.description: Roar with excitement at the Dinosaur gallery, home to a massive T-Rex! Also, don't miss the Blue Whale and the Wildlife Garden.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: DINOSAURS! Especially the T-Rex! This is a must-see for any dinosaur fan.

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Victoria line to Green Park, then Piccadilly line to South Kensington, 50 mins
transport.tip: Head straight to the Dinosaur gallery when you arrive.

activities.title: London Transport Museum Adventure
activities.description: Climb on old buses and trains, explore the tube simulator, and play in the All Aboard zone at the London Transport Museum. A great day for transport enthusiasts!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: He can climb on real buses and trains! Plus, there's a tube simulator!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Victoria line to Oxford Circus, then Piccadilly line to Covent Garden, 40 mins

activities.title: National Maritime Museum & Greenwich Park
activities.description: Explore ships, play in the AHOY! children's gallery, and enjoy the great playground outside the National Maritime Museum. Then, run around in Greenwich Park.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Ships, a playground, and a big park to run around in! Plus, you can take the DLR to Cutty Sark!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Stratford, then DLR to Cutty Sark, 50 mins
transport.tip: Take the DLR for a fun train ride!

activities.title: Science Museum's Garden and Flight Gallery
activities.description: Let George explore The Garden (under 5s area), marvel at the planes in the Flight gallery, and see the trains in Making the Modern World.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Planes and trains all in one place! The Garden is perfect for his age group.

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Victoria line to Green Park, then Piccadilly line to South Kensington, 50 mins
transport.tip: Book tickets for Wonderlab in advance.

activities.title: Crystal Palace Park Dinosaurs and Farm
activities.description: See the amazing Victorian dinosaur statues on islands, visit the farm, and explore the maze at Crystal Palace Park. A fun day out for the whole family!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Dinosaurs! He'll love seeing the huge dinosaur statues and running around the park.

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Overground to Crystal Palace, 1 hour
transport.tip: Bring a picnic to enjoy by the dinosaurs!

activities.title: RAF Museum London
activities.description: Explore huge aircraft hangers filled with planes! There is also a 4D cinema and an outdoor playground.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: He loves planes and helicopters! He will be amazed by the size of the aircraft.

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Victoria line to Euston, then Northern line to Colindale, 1 hour

bookAhead.title: Book Ahead
bookAhead.subtitle: Coming up in the next 2-8 weeks

activities.title: Hey Duggee Live!
activities.description: Join Duggee and the Squirrels for a fun-filled live show with singing, dancing, and lots of badges to earn! A must-see for Hey Duggee fans.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: It's Hey Duggee! He loves earning badges!

transport.tip: Book tickets early, as they sell out quickly!

activities.title: Peppa Pig Live
activities.description: Peppa, George, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig are back in a brand new live show filled with singing and dancing
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: He loves Peppa Pig and George, and muddy puddles!

transport.tip: Book tickets early, as they sell out quickly!

activities.title: Dinosaur World Live
activities.description: Experience the thrill of meeting life-size dinosaur puppets in this interactive and educational show. A roaring adventure for dinosaur lovers!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: LIFE-SIZE DINOSAUR PUPPETS! He'll be amazed!

transport.tip: Some dinosaurs can be a bit scary, so be prepared to reassure him.

activities.title: Bluey's Big Play
activities.description: Join Bluey, Bingo, Mum and Dad in their first live theatre show featuring brilliantly created puppets.

transport.tip: Book tickets early, as they sell out quickly!

activities.title: Half Moon Theatre Show
activities.description: Check the Half Moon Theatre's schedule for upcoming kids' shows. They often have interactive performances perfect for little ones.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: It's close to home and offers kid-friendly shows!

transport.tip: Check their website for show listings and age recommendations.
